channel.title: Ssh client probelms please read! help!?!?!
channel.description: And ssh client is a client that helps run my p server on my dedicated server, well whenever i close out of it the server crashes... Is there a way to fix this so the server runs 24/7 without me having to have the ssh client connected to the internet?
